document.heading: Water and Sewer Authority Collections Clarification Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-132, the “Water and Sewer Authority Collections Clarification Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-405, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2003, and January 6, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 29, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-333 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-132 became effective on March 30, 2004.
